name: Hyddan's Quest
description:
Game made with GDevelop!

Hello, Adventurer! Are you prepared to face the challenges in Hyddan's Quest? It is not an infinite touch game. IT IS BETTER! Discover possible endings, live the story, evolve characters, destroy enemies! Available on Google Play! ⚔️ 𝗣𝗥𝗘𝗣𝗔𝗥𝗘 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗔𝗗𝗩𝗘𝗡𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘!

The crystal was stolen and Eve was gone. What past does she hide and what is behind her disappearance? Drukan is about to return. Would anyone be able to keep hope alive?

🔹 𝗜𝗡 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗔𝗗𝗩𝗘𝗡𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘 𝗬𝗢𝗨 𝗖𝗔𝗡

▪️ It is not an infinite touch game. 𝗜𝗧 𝗜𝗦 𝗕𝗘𝗧𝗧𝗘𝗥! Discover the possible endings!
▪️ TAP to destroy your enemies;
▪️ EVOLVE your CHARACTERS and make them powerful!
▪️ EVOLVE your party member's SKILLS and burn your enemies with powerful wizard attacks!
▪️ Follow an immersive STORY;
▪️ Dialogues with FUNNY references!
▪️ COMPLETE QUESTS on different MAPS!
▪️ And much more!

Only for Android (for now)!
Please, leave a feedback. It's important for futures updates!
